means: 哮吼，义膜性喉炎，（马牛等的）臀部

word_mean: 格鲁布，哮吼：因变态反应、异物、感染或新生物引起之急性喉阻塞，主要发生于婴儿和儿童，表现为共鸣性犬吠样咳、声嘶和持续喘鸣

sentence.Network_en: There is no slope or angle to the croup.
sentence.Network_cn: 在臀部没有斜面和角度.

sentence.Network_en: It is set smoothly into the croup and low rather than high.
sentence.Network_cn: 尾巴平滑的与臀部结合,位置低,不能太高.

sentence.Network_en: Croup -- Long, rounded and full, sinking slightly toward the tail.
sentence.Network_cn: 长 、 圆而丰满, 略微没入明显的尾巴中.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...gh)为临床表徵的病症，通常是由感染症所引起，诸如哮吼(croup)、急性会厌炎(acute epiglottitis)、急性喉头炎(laryngitis)、急性气管.
《Friends》词汇表B ... frieze n. [建]中楣, 起绒粗呢 croup n. 义膜性喉炎, (马牛等的)臀部 Australia, 澳大利亚.
医学及制药专业词汇 - 翻译学习资料区大家论坛 ... croton seed 巴豆 croup 格鲁布 croupous bronchitis 格鲁布性支气管炎.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from dialect croup 'to croak', of imitative origin
Middle English: from Old French croupe, ultimately of Germanic origin and related to crop

entry.def: Croup is a disease which children sometimes suffer from that makes it difficult for them to breathe and causes them to cough a lot.

means.word_mean: 1. a disease of infants and young children; harsh coughing and hoarseness and fever and difficult breathing
2. the part of a quadruped that corresponds to the human buttocks

auth_sentence.content: There's minimal or no coughing, unlike viral croup.
